messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

doc/go1.1.html: document the moving of exp/... and old/....

R=golang-dev, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7445050

LGTM https://codereview.appspot.com/7445050/diff/1/doc/go1.1.html File doc/go1.1.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7445050/diff/1/doc/go1.1.html#newcode185 doc/go1.1.html:185:

Exp and old subtrees moved to go.net subrepo

s/go\.net/go.exp/

NOT LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/7445050/diff/2002/doc/go1.1.html
File doc/go1.1.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7445050/diff/2002/doc/go1.1.html#newcode196

and same below?
